fields.name: Primitivo Salento Torcicoda
fields.description: Torcicoda is a wine produced by Tormaresca with Primitivo grapes coming from vines grown as sapling and spurred cordon at the Tenuta MaÃ¬me di S. Pietro Vernotico. The grapes were harvested just overdried during the first week of September. After crushing, maceration, managed with soft pumping over and delÃ¨stage, was continued for 15 days in stainless steel tanks. During this phase, the wines completed the alcoholic fermentation at a temperature not exceeding 26 Â° C. After the vinification of the wine, the malolactic fermentation took place directly in French and Hungarian oak barrels, in which it was raised for about 10 months. A further period of 8 months of aging in bottle followed before being placed on the market. Characterized by an intense ruby â€‹â€‹red color. It has fruity aromas of plum, blackberry and raspberry combined with the spicy ones of pepper, coffee and cocoa. On the palate it releases a soft, rich, pleasant and elegant flavor, of good intensity and persistence. Serve at a temperature of 18-20 Â° C.

fields.name: Stilio Primitivo di Manduria
fields.description: Lovely nose of reduced dark fruits and raisins. Medium palette with great complexity and very well integrated tannins. Short finish with hints of Vanilla and oak.

fields.name: Li Filitti Riserva Primitivo di Manduria
fields.description: Very good Italian primitivo ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹ very rich fruity nose followed by a great palate with lots of Blackberry, oak, cherry and some Black pepper.

fields.name: Primitivo di Manduria
fields.description: This primitivo is a fruit driven sweeter primitivo with notes of darker berrys like cherry, raisin and blackberry. It's earthy and rustic

fields.name: 1 Uno Primitivo di Manduria Riserva
fields.description: This primitivo is a fruit driven sweeter primitivo with notes of darker berrys like cherry, raisin and blackberry. It's earthy and rustic

fields.name: Appassito Primitivo
fields.description: This primitivo is a fruit driven sweeter primitivo with notes of darker berrys like cherry, raisin and blackberry. It's earthy and rustic

fields.name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
fields.description: Amarone is a rich, expressive red wine from the Veneto region of northeastern Italy. Its full name is Amarone della Valpolicella, and it's produced from a blend of grapes including Corvina, Corvinone, Rondinella, and (less commonly these days) Molinara.

fields.name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
fields.description: Amarone is a rich, expressive red wine from the Veneto region of northeastern Italy. Its full name is Amarone della Valpolicella, and it's produced from a blend of grapes including Corvina, Corvinone, Rondinella, and (less commonly these days) Molinara.

fields.name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
fields.description: Amarone is a rich, expressive red wine from the Veneto region of northeastern Italy. Its full name is Amarone della Valpolicella, and it's produced from a blend of grapes including Corvina, Corvinone, Rondinella, and (less commonly these days) Molinara.

fields.name: Corse
fields.description: Dry and well-balanced between fruity and mineral

fields.name: Corse SartÃ¨ne Rouge
fields.description: Fantastic medium bodied red, fresh loaded with gariguette strawberry.

fields.name: Corse SartÃ¨ne Rouge
fields.description: Intense aromas of freshly crushed raspberries with a rich palate of fresh red berries and subtle spices. All nicely balanced with firm tannins.

fields.name: TranoÃ¯ Rouge
fields.description: A rich wine that takes you to thhe forest in Narnia in just a sip. Reminds you of colder weather by the water with some vanilla hints

fields.name: Redemption Unwooded Chardonnay
fields.description: Excellent unwooded Chardonnay. Lemon, fresh green apples, lime, and herbs.

fields.name: Grains de Cocotte Chardonnay - Sauvignon
fields.description: A lot of floral, honey, citrus and green fruits on the nose. Really Interesting! There is a nice balance and blend between the freshness and minerality of the SB and the body of the Chardonnay.

fields.name: Yarden Chardonnay
fields.description: A lot of floral, honey, citrus and green fruits on the nose. Really Interesting! There is a nice balance and blend between the freshness and minerality of the SB and the body of the Chardonnay.

fields.name: Negroamaro Salento Calafuria Rosato
fields.description: A cherry rosÃ© filled with citrus flavours that goes to the drier palets

fields.description: A cherry rosÃ© filled with citrus flavours that goes to the drier palets

fields.description: A cherry rosÃ© filled with citrus flavours that goes to the drier palets

fields.name: Rosato
fields.description: Amazingly fresh and crisp, nice style. General aromas/flavours: floral, red fruit, green fruit, citrus Pale salmon colour with pink hues. Nose: pronounced Aromas of rose petals, barberry, raspberry, strawberry, green apple, asparagus, quince, lemon, lime, cranberry, red cherry, wet stones Palate: medium+ Flavours of cranberry, sour cherry, quince, lemon, lime, green apple Dry. High acidity, full body. Medium+ finish.

fields.name: Romance RosÃ©
fields.description: The summerrosÃ© you need! I mineral touch at first that goes over to a smoth flavour. Goes amazing to seafood and just by it self!

fields.name: ChÃ¢teau Favori
fields.description: Nose of strawberry, lavender, and rose petal with melon, fennel, and white pepper on palate and black pepper finish. A lot of peppery notes, as in most of Provence rosÃ© wines.

fields.name: Zinfandel 770 Miles
fields.description: Very fruity aromas: sweet cherry jam, vanilla, milky chocolate, even flowers?; easy going wine, drink slightly chill, unbeatable price.

fields.name: Adulation Zinfandel
fields.description: Aroma had blackberries, blueberries, plenty of oak, vanilla and smoke. Over the palate came blackberries, black currants, cedar, oak, smoke, licorice and tobacco.

fields.name: Heritage Collection Zinfandel
fields.description: Very fruity aromas: sweet cherry jam, vanilla, milky chocolate, even flowers?; easy going wine, drink slightly chill, unbeatable price.

fields.name: Bourbon Barrel Aged Cabernet Sauvignon
fields.description: It's whisky barrel aged wine. Nose: developed, med intensity, vanilla, menthol, eucalyptus, black currant, blackberry, blueberry, black fruit, dark chocolate, tobacco, cedar, leather. Palate: dry, high acidity, pronounced tannin, high alcohol, full body, long aftertaste.

fields.name: Cabernet Sauvignon
fields.description: So smooth you could do the land speed record on it. Legs that go on for miles and miles. Everything else is paired down and minimal.

fields.name: Cabernet Sauvignon
fields.description: Lots of lush dark fruit with some smoke/leather.

fields.name: Vol Au Dessus d'Un Nid de Chardonnay
fields.description: Light golden yellow color. Aromas of grapefruit and vanilla. Soft attack, moderate acidity, soft citrus flavors with a bit of sweetness. Short finish.

fields.name: Chardonnay Adulation
fields.description: Light golden yellow color. Aromas of grapefruit and vanilla. Soft attack, moderate acidity, soft citrus flavors with a bit of sweetness. Short finish.

fields.name: Chardonnay
fields.description: Light golden yellow color. Aromas of grapefruit and vanilla. Soft attack, moderate acidity, soft citrus flavors with a bit of sweetness. Short finish.

fields.name: Bread & Butter Chardonnay
fields.description: Grapefruit, honey, and peach nose. Medium gold color. Medium full bodied, dry, hint of effervescence , medium high acidity. Starts with cream and apricot evolving grassy notes finishing with a hint of vanilla.

fields.name: Chardonnay Lapis Luna
fields.description: Grapefruit, honey, and peach nose. Medium gold color. Medium full bodied, dry, hint of effervescence , medium high acidity. Starts with cream and apricot evolving grassy notes finishing with a hint of vanilla.

fields.name: Ancherona Chardonnay Toscana
fields.description: Grapefruit, honey, and peach nose. Medium gold color. Medium full bodied, dry, hint of effervescence , medium high acidity. Starts with cream and apricot evolving grassy notes finishing with a hint of vanilla.

fields.name: Merlot
fields.description: Red fruits with hints of wood ageing on the nose; it is medium bodied with smooth tannins. It has a pleasant aftertaste of coffee on the palate.

fields.name: Sugarloaf Mountain
fields.description: Inky in color with a short purple rim. Full bodied and bold with medium acidity. Dry and very fruity on the palate. Showing blackberries, raisins, dried figs, vanilla, cola, cedar, milk chocolates, tobacco, peppercorn, espresso, light vinaigrette and Mediterranean spices. This 9 year old Cabernet Sauvignon is showing nice complexity with a nice mouthfeel.

fields.name: Merlot
fields.description: Nice north Italy wine with dark cherry and some tanning. Great taste with leather and cocoa and earth soil.

fields.name: Bruno Riesling Kab
fields.description: Fresh with nice balanced sweetnes. Green apples, peach, white fowers and lemon zest on the nose. Green apples, lime, lemon zest and a litle minerols. Nice fresh finish.

fields.name: Kung Fu Girl Riesling
fields.description: 100% Riesling - Tropical and Balanced Style White Wine - 12% ALC - Light Golden Color Fresh Ripe Peaches Floral Rich Lemony Citrus Grassy Medium Bodied Apricot Buttery Dry Balanced Racy Acidity Crisp Mineral Nectarine. Drive Finish Served w/ Scallop and Shrimp. Over Wild Rice and Raisins Also a nice Sipper slightly chilled Cheers and Enjoy

fields.name: Riesling
fields.description: Aromas of lime, minerality and citrus blossom. On the palate, lime, apricot and minerality. Dry, light body, crisp acidity, good concentration, slight spritz.

fields.name: CÃ´te des Roses
fields.description: Crisp dry rose from Languedoc. Strawberry, raspberry, a little guava and citrus, with like a jam and cream cheese croissant kinda vibe. Great acidity and a decent finish.

fields.name: Sofia RosÃ©
fields.description: Well balanced rose from Coppola winery in Monterey. Refreshing rose with hints of berries. No presence of minerals.

fields.name: Josh RosÃ©
fields.description: Well balanced rose from Coppola winery in Monterey. Refreshing rose with hints of berries. No presence of minerals.
fields.image_url: Very pleasant nice ripe fruits mix of strawberries peaches balanced acidity very smooth nice crisp finish great to sip or with spicy foods.

fields.name: Fune Extra Brut N.V.
fields.description: Another bottle of bubbles we had to celebrate. This is a crisp - great tasting - a bubbly delight. The Italians really do have some excellent fizz.

fields.name: Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore N.V.
fields.description: Another bottle of bubbles we had to celebrate. This is a crisp - great tasting - a bubbly delight. The Italians really do have some excellent fizz.

fields.name: Prior Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore Brut
fields.description: Another bottle of bubbles we had to celebrate. This is a crisp - great tasting - a bubbly delight. The Italians really do have some excellent fizz.

fields.name: Moscato d'Asti
fields.description: Fantastically fresh and vivid sparkling wine. Ideal for summer evenings. Notes of elderflower. A great example for a high quality Asti wine.

fields.name: Moscato N.V.
fields.description: Very fine long lasting bubbles with a lemon straw color. Sweet with a hint of tartness on the finish. Very classy tiffany blue color bottles Delightful.

fields.name: Tardivo
fields.description: Very fine long lasting bubbles with a lemon straw color. Sweet with a hint of tartness on the finish. Very classy tiffany blue color bottles Delightful.

fields.name: Asti N.V.
fields.description: On the nose apple pear yeast bread a hint of floral. On the palate same flavor as aromas with some honey sweet but not overly sweet.

fields.name: Asti N.V.
fields.description: On the nose apple pear yeast bread a hint of floral. On the palate same flavor as aromas with some honey sweet but not overly sweet.

fields.name: Asti Dolce N.V.
fields.description: On the nose apple pear yeast bread a hint of floral. On the palate same flavor as aromas with some honey sweet but not overly sweet.

fields.name: Lumera
fields.description: A very pleasant and fragrant wine with nice fruity and floral bouquet. Wild strawberries, pomegranate, cranberry in powdered sugar, hints of violets and rose petals.

fields.name: La Folie Sparkling RosÃ© N.V.
fields.description: Easy drinking, semi sweet, strong strawberry note, reminds me of a strawberry bubble gum.

fields.name: Pfefferer Pink
fields.description: Light straw colour. Nose of musk and melon. Medium acidity. Very front of mouth. Jack fruit. Tropical. Green melon. Slightly chewy. Tart and dry.

fields.name: La Folie Sparkling RosÃ© N.V.
fields.description: Easy drinking, semi sweet, strong strawberry note, reminds me of a strawberry bubble gum.

fields.name: Aimery CrÃ©mant de Limoux Grande CuvÃ©e 1531 N.V.
fields.description: Medium gold colour. On the nose pear, pie crust, chamomile, and a touch of honey. There's a sulphurous characteristic to the nose. Dry with a touch of RS, medium alcohol, medium acidity. Asian pear, gooseberry and raspberry on the lengthy palate. Decent complexity here.

fields.name: Cremant d'Alsace Brut Extra N.V.
fields.description: A charming blend of 60% Pinot Auxerrois, 20% Chardonnay, 15% Pinot Blanc, and 5% Pinot Noir. The Meyer-FonnÃ© CrÃ©mant d'Alsace Extra Brut sees only a minimal dosage and sports an autolytic nose of biscuit, apples and lilting white flowers. On the palate, a very fine, delicate mousse is bolstered by moderate acidity and subtle creaminess. It has a large mineral foundation upon which this wine is built: it is all chalk and sea salt, and there is even a touch of dried thyme and dried lemon zest.

fields.name: MillÃ©sime Rare Brut Champagne
fields.description: Beautiful bottle and the intricate mortif that accentuated this grand dame of Champagne. Deep golden yellow. Refined beads spiralling up the flute. Sophistry in the bottle. Apple, cream biscuits, yeast, lemon, and nectar.

fields.name: Pfefferer
fields.description: This is a stunning dry Moscato, with a complex fruity bouquet which reminds of the best Gewurtztraminers.
